Screen Flow that is a data entry form for a Directory listing.
Flow.label: Screen - Directory Listing

recordLookups.name: get_BusinessMemberships
recordLookups.label: get_BusinessMemberships
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6 OR 7)

fields.name: text4
fields.fieldText: Your changes have been saved.

fields.name: text4_0
fields.fieldText: Your changes have been saved.

fields.name: text4_0_0
fields.fieldText: Your changes have been saved.

screens.description: Data entry form for a Directory listing.
screens.name: Directory_Listing_Entry_Form
screens.label: Directory Listing Entry Form - No Business

fields.name: text9
fields.fieldText: Certified Member Listing

fields.name: Text8
fields.fieldText: By opting in, you agree to have your business and/or personal information provided listed in our public directory. To save changes, click the Update button at the bottom of this form.

fields.name: Get_User_Name
fields.helpText: This data is pulled from your account and cannot be edited. Edits to your account name in the My Account page will be reflected here.

fields.name: Directory_Radius
fields.helpText: If you wish for your listing to only show up within a select radius (in miles) from the address provided, please enter your preferred radius. This is typically used for mobile services or professionals who travel up to a certain radius. All others should leave blank.

fields.name: text13
fields.fieldText: Care Type & Species

screens.description: Data entry form for a Directory listing.
screens.name: Directory_Listing_Entry_Form_0
screens.label: Directory Listing Entry Form - Business

fields.name: text2
fields.fieldText: Business Listing

fields.name: text1
fields.fieldText: By opting in, you agree to have your business and/or personal information provided listed in our public directory. To save changes, click the Update button at the bottom of this form.

fields.name: Directory_Title
fields.helpText: This data is pulled from your business account and cannot be edited. Please contact wags@fearfree.com to have your business account name updated.

fields.name: Directory_Radius_0
fields.helpText: If you wish for your listing to only show up within a select radius (in miles) from the address provided, please enter your preferred radius. This is typically used for mobile services or professionals who travel up to a certain radius. All others should leave blank.

fields.name: Text102
fields.fieldText: Care Type & Species

fields.name: display_CertifiedInformation
fields.fieldText:
Since you are a member of a team, your listing information is associated with your team’s Business Account. If opted in, your name as shown below, will appear within the Business Account listing. To learn more about our new online directory, visit this help center article. {NEED LINK}

By opting in, you agree to have your personal information provided listed in our public directory.

To save changes, click the Update button at the bottom of this form.

fields.name: displayText_TACertifiedMember
fields.fieldText:
If opted in, you will show as:

{!Get_User.Name}

screens.name: Directory_Listing_Entry_Form_Non_Admin
screens.label: Directory Listing Entry Form - Non Admin

fields.name: text5
fields.fieldText: Certified Member Listing

fields.name: text7
fields.fieldText:
Since you are a member of a team, your listing information is associated with your team’s Business Account. If opted in, your name as shown below, will appear within the Business Account listing. To learn more about our new online directory, visit this help center article. {NEED LINK}

By opting in, you agree to have your personal information provided listed in our public directory.

To save changes, click the Update button at the bottom of this form.

fields.name: DiplayName
fields.fieldText:
If opted in, you will show as:

{!Get_User.Name}

fields.name: displayText_NoActiveMemberships
fields.fieldText:
It looks like your membership(s) is inactive, which means your certification is as well. Renew your membership(s) to regain access to this exclusive benefit!


Go to My Memberships

fields.name: displayText_NoCertifiedMembers
fields.fieldText: Your business does not qualify for the Directory because your business has no certified members.

fields.name: displayText_NoActiveMemberships_0
fields.fieldText:
You are not yet certified! This exclusive benefit will be available once you have completed a certification program. We hope to see you back here soon!


Go to My Learning

fields.name: displayText_OnlyAcademia
fields.fieldText:
This benefit is not available to Academia Members. Upgrade your membership to unlock access to this exclusive benefit.


Upgrade Now
